Thanks for all of your help. I really appreciate it. Currently, I'm 
not ev=
en sure if my Katana is authentic or a fake. My wife bought it 
from EBay. =
She, of course, didn't think that the seller could be 
trying to scam her s=
o she didn't do any reseach before buying it. I've 
been doing research NOW=
 though (unfortunately it may be too little too 
late). The Hada looks like=
 it is acid etched into the sword, giving me 
the impression that it's fake=
, but I could be wrong. There is kanji 
located on the tang but I haven't b=
een able to translate it. It seems 
as though there are no kanji characters=
 that match the ones on the 
tang. Might just be hard to find a correct mat=
ch since I'm not an 
expert in kanji translating. Any thoughts?
